headline: Norfolk Southern Weighs Safety Costs And Merger Attention As Valuation Stretches
summary: Norfolk Southern (NYSE:NSC) is in focus as it pursues operational improvements and cost discipline following the East Palestine derailment. The company reports better than expected adjusted profit and continues to invest in infrastructure and safety initiatives. Industry attention has intensified as a planned merger with Union Pacific is discussed, drawing fresh regulatory and legal scrutiny. Norfolk Southern, trading at $314.94, sits at the center of a major rail industry story, with its...

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Norfolk Southern (NSC) After Strong 1-Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are looking at Norfolk Southern and wondering whether the current share price lines up with the underlying business, you are in the right place for a closer look at value. The stock last closed at US$314.94, with recent returns of 3.0% over 7 days, 8.4% over 30 days, 9.4% year to date, 25.5% over 1 year, 47.7% over 3 years and 34.3% over 5 years.
